Hello,


I have an extractor that when I open the profile and attempt to ed=
it the the fields inside the console, such as keyword or even mysql db cred=
entials, it doesn't update anything.

I always have to edit the .java direc=
tly and recompile and start Heritrix in order for the changes to have any e=
ffect.

How can I use the console to make the changes on the fly?  Is there=
 a file or code missing in my installation?

I have a programmer that will =
fix it for me, but before I spend the money, I'd like to know what I am get=
ting into as far as complexity and cash.

Thanks,

David
